import axios from "axios" import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function App() { const [info, setInfo] = useState({}) const [ location, setLocation] = useState() const url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${location}&appid=dbfc58248986c6dec618446e83e49191` const search = () => { axios.get(url).then((resp) => { setInfo(resp.data) console.log(resp.data) }) } return (
setLocation(e.target.value)}/>
